title.narrative: Women for Human Rights Single Women Group

description.narrative:
To strengthen widows’ rights advocacy at the regional and UN levels.
The project will focus on providing a forum for issues of widowhood at national as well as regional and global level. The international agencies, UN and donor community needs to respond on the journey of widows towards empowerment. WHR has United Nations ECOSOC consultative status since 2011 and this has paved a way to submit written statement and oral statement in UN CSW every year to voice out the issues of widowhood globally with other agencies working for widowhood.Likely, international conference will support to disseminate and strategize the ways to spread the learnings through out different countries in the form of Kathmandu declaration. The issues prevalent country specific will be thoroughly discussed and prioritized, best successful practices will be shared for the multiplier learning and implementation. Likewise, to speed up the network and get the support from global arena, WHR Inc has been established and this needs proper functional approach. The strategic plan of WHR INC for few years is necessary to achieve the targeted outputs and outcomes systematically with all indicators.
